  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Account​(java.lang.String handle, java.lang.String descField, java.lang.Integer uid)
    Creates an account Sets the arraylist of posts to empty, since an account can only make posts after it has been created

      Parameters:
      handle - code of the account
      descField - description field of the account
      uid - user ID of the account
